tossup_question: 10) EARTH AND SPACE  Which of the following is incorrect about seismic waves
tossup_MCQoptions:
W) S-waves can only pass through fluids
X) P-waves can pass through solids as well as fluids
Y) Body waves consist of P and S-waves
Z) Surface waves move the slowest out of all the seismic waves
tossup_answer: ANSWER: W) S-waves can only pass through fluids
bonus_question: 10) EARTH AND SPACE  The intensity of an earthquake is measured by the
bonus_MCQoptions:
W) Richter scale
X) Enhanced Fujita scale
Y) Saffir–Simpson scale
Z) Modified Mercalli scale
